item.title: Zeenat Aman makes her Instagram debut, shares thoughts as 'only woman on a set' in the 70s
item.description: Veteran actor Zeenat Aman, who was last seen in a cameo in the period film Panipat (2019), made her Instagram debut on Saturday. She went on to share her thoughts about being the 'only woman on a set' in the 1970s and now hopes to connect with more young women working in the industry today.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut encouraged by Jyothika's remark, says it is 'impossible to match up to her brilliance' in Chandramukhi 2
item.description: Actor Kangana Ranaut responded to a tweet in which Jyothika had mentioned the actor as her favourite in Bollywood. She then shared that she was watching Jyothika's performance from the 2005 film for the Tamil sequel. The actor added it was 'impossible to match up to her brilliance'.

item.title: Suniel Shetty says he's KL Rahul's father and not father-in-law: 'I was his fan and...'
item.description: Suniel Shetty spoke about son-in-law, cricketer KL Rahul in new interview. He said ‘he is a father to KL Rahul.' Suniel admitted he was his big fan and is now his father. Suniel's actor-daughter Athiya Shetty got married to Rahul on January 23 in an intimate ceremony.

item.title: Urvashi Rautela is not part of Rishab Shetty's Kantara 2, rumours 'totally baseless and untrue': Source
item.description: A source close to the production banner Hombale Films revealed that actor Urvashi Rautela is not part of the recently announced prequel to the blockbuster Kannada film Kantara. She had put up an Instagram post on Saturday that seemed to indicate that she was part of the next film.
item.itunes:title: Urvashi Rautela is not part of Rishab Shetty's Kantara 2, rumours 'totally baseless and untrue': Source

content:encoded.p: A source close to the production banner Hombale Films revealed that actor Urvashi Rautela is not part of the recently announced prequel to the blockbuster Kannada film Kantara. She had put up an Instagram post on Saturday that seemed to indicate that she was part of the next film.

item.title: Rakhi Sawant reacts to Kiara Advani-Sidharth Malhotra wedding: 'Ghinn aati hai love birds ko dekhkar'
item.description: Rakhi Sawant shared that she does not like to see ‘love birds’ around her amid ongoing spat with husband Adil Khan Durrani. She said has developed bad feelings for ‘marriage’. She talked about Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani's wedding in a paparazzo video.

item.title: When Pran refused to a Filmfare award for Beimaan, believed Pakeezah deserved awards in 1972
item.description: Sunday marks 103rd birth anniversary of Pran and we revisit the time he refused to accept a Filmfare award for Beimaan. Beimaan got the award for best music that year, and Pran believed Ghulam Mohammad should have received it instead for Pakeezah.
item.itunes:title: When Pran refused to a Filmfare award for Beimaan, believed Pakeezah deserved awards in 1972

content:encoded.p: Sunday marks 103rd birth anniversary of Pran and we revisit the time he refused to accept a Filmfare award for Beimaan. Beimaan got the award for best music that year, and Pran believed Ghulam Mohammad should have received it instead for Pakeezah.

item.title: When 19-year old Mischa Barton revealed her publicist asked her to sleep with 30-year-old Leonardo DiCaprio
item.description: In 2005, actor Mischa Barton shared in an interview that her publicist asked her to sleep with Leonardo DiCaprio after his breakup with Gisele Bündchen. Mischa was 19 at the time. Leonardo, who is now 48, is reportedly dating 19-year-old model, Eden Polani.

item.title: Shah Rukh Khan won't watch Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayenge, here's why he prefers Pathaan instead
item.description: Actor Shah Rukh Khan has said that the competition of his action film (Pathaan) and the one which made him popular as the romantic hero - Raj - is 'killing him'. SRK's action film Pathaan and the 1995 romantic film DDLJ are currently being screened in theatres.

item.itunes:title: Pathaan box office: Shah Rukh Khan's film grosses over ₹900 crore worldwide in 17 days; takes India total to ₹558 crore

content:encoded.p: Pathaan box office: Shah Rukh Khan's film grosses over ₹900 crore worldwide in 17 days. It also earned ₹558 crore in India.

item.title: Dalljiet Kaur appeals fans to vote for ex-husband Shalin Bhanot on Bigg Boss 16: 'Itne mahine family se dur rehna...'
item.description: Actor Dalljiet Kaur took to Instagram and shared a video for ex-husband Shalin Bhanot. Dalljiet rooted for him to win Bigg Boss 16, and asked fans to vote for him. Bigg Boss's grand finale will be held on February 12.
item.itunes:title: Dalljiet Kaur appeals fans to vote for ex-husband Shalin Bhanot on Bigg Boss 16: 'Itne mahine family se dur rehna...'

content:encoded.p: Actor Dalljiet Kaur took to Instagram and shared a video for ex-husband Shalin Bhanot. Dalljiet rooted for him to win Bigg Boss 16, and asked fans to vote for him. Bigg Boss's grand finale will be held on February 12.

item.title: Busy Wednesday schedule kept Jenna Ortega from returning to You Season 4
item.description: Actor Jenna Ortega was supposed to return on Netflix's You Season 4, starring Penn Badgley. However, her lead role and busy schedule on Netflix's series Wednesday kept her from coming back for her role as Joe's teenage neighbour Ellie.
item.itunes:title: Busy Wednesday schedule kept Jenna Ortega from returning to You Season 4

content:encoded.p: Actor Jenna Ortega was supposed to return on Netflix's You Season 4, starring Penn Badgley. However, her lead role and busy schedule on Netflix's series Wednesday kept her from coming back for her role as Joe's teenage neighbour Ellie.

item.title: Sanjay Dutt wishes wife Maanayata Dutt 'Happy 15th anniversary' with throwback pics. Watch
item.description: Actor Sanjay Dutt married wife Maanayata Dutt in 2008. They have two children, 12-year-old twins Shahraan Dutt and Iqra Dutt. He shared a video celebrating their 15th wedding anniversary.

item.title: Kapil Sharma shows off his ‘international’ fan following, shares fan moment on Instagram. See pics
item.description: Kapil Sharma shared a fan moment on social media handle. He showed off his international fan following as he got clicked with one of his fans in a foreign country. He looked happy in the pictures with his fan.

item.title: Sara Ali Khan soaks in sun in neon swimsuit, shares pic from vacation in Australia; aunt Saba Ali Khan reacts. See pic
item.description: Actor Sara Ali Khan shared pictures from her holiday in Sydney. She made the most out of her time in Australia basking in the sun, and chilled out on the sand in swimsuit. Saif Ali Khan's sister Saba Pataudi reacted to her latest post.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut is feeling bad for Nawazuddin Siddiqui amid his house row with wife: 'Kya badmashi hai?'
item.description: Kangana Ranaut said she wants to cry after Nawazuddin Siddiqui's wife Aaliya shared secret video of the ‘big star’. She also reacted after Aaliya locked him outside home.
